title: Bittersweet
creator_credit: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Maria Savarino
brief_description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.
creator_credit_for_label: ACMI, ACMI Digital Storytelling and Maria Savarino
description: When the train from Beijing to Lhasa started running again, Maria Savarino and her husband took the opportunity to visit Tibet before it had changed forever. What they found there was a bittersweet experience they will never forget but also never revisit.
